item.title: CVE-2010-4237|2024-08-07T03:34:37.773Z -- mercurial -- mercurial
item.description: Mercurial before 1.6.4 fails to verify the Common Name field of SSL certificates which allows remote attackers who acquire a certificate signed by a Certificate Authority to perform a man-in-the-middle attack.
